did.unittitle: Citizen's Transportation Committee of Saratoga County Collection
did.abstract: This collection was assembled by Jean Stamm, retired Librarian and active participant in the Citizen’s Transportation Committee, and represents the process the committee followed to increase and enhance public transportation accessibility in Saratoga County.

accessrestrict.p: Items in this collection may be subject to Copyright Laws.

bioghist.p: In response to the issues and concerns of a growing rural county a group of concerned citizens formed the Citizen’s Transportation Committee of Saratoga County as a “ countywide clearinghouse to provide efficient transportation modes and infrastructure that will consider both the current needs and by projecting thirty years out, future needs, using the expertise of existing agencies, informed individuals, and organizations as support resources.”
The records in this collection were assembled by an active and passionate participant of the committee, Jean Stamm.

scopecontent.p: This collection contains the reports, agenda’s and minutes created by the Citizen’s Committee and collected by a member, Jean Stamm. The records are arranged chronologically within each series.
